thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com
thread.title: Mary June Bartlett
thread.title_full: DogVacay reviewed by Mary June Bartlett

author: Mary June Bartlett
title: Mary June Bartlett
text: When a family emergency came up while we were on the road in our RV, we needed someone on short notice to visit the RV park and tend to our three little dogs in their home-on-wheels for a day. DogVacay enabled us to identify someone close to the RV park who had the experience, confidence and availability to handle our pack (including one whose fear-aggressive behavior has spooked other dog people) without any problems. Recommended!
